Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Ms. Peaches
Reviews.Content: These security camera cables work great! Product is both affordable and sturdy. Great use for distant cameras as the cables can easily connect to make a longer 100 ft cable.

Reviews.Title: Flimsy
Reviews.Author: GZ
Reviews.Content: You pay for you get!  I had to wiggle the connector to make the connection.  Once i did this there was no problem, yet.

ProductInfo.Features:
All-in-one audio video and power cable
2 of 50 feet audio video power cables in black
RCA audio & BNC video & 2.1mm power connectors
Video audio power cable has bonus BNC RCA adapters
For camera with DC power only
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 2 Pack 50ft Security Camera Audio Video Power Cables RCA DVR CCTV Surveillance Wires with bonus BNC RCA Connectors 1Q1
